question.string: Which groups were founded in 1924?

Qui a produit l'album Dookie?
Wie produceerde het album Dookie?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?producer WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:album . ?album dc:title 'Dookie' . ?album mo:producer ?producer . }

Gib mir alle Solokünstler mit mehr als drei Kollaborationen.
Dame todos los solistas que han contribuido en más de tres colaboraciones.
Dammi tutti i solisti che hanno effettuato più di tre collaborazioni.
Donnes-moi tous les artistes solos qui ont au moins trois collaborations.
Geef alle solo-artiesten die meer dan drie keer een samenwerking aangingen.
question.keywords: solo artist, number of collaborations, greater than 3
solistas, numero de colaboraciones, más de 3
solista, numero di collaborazioni, maggiore di 3
artistes solos, au moins trois collaborations
question.query: PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rel: <http://purl.org/vocab/relationship/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?artist WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:SoloMusicArtist . ?artist rel:collaboratesWith ?collaboration . } GROUP BY ?artist ?name HAVING (COUNT(?collaboration) > 3)

FILTER ( ?date <= '2000-12-31'^^xsd:date && ?date >= '2000-01-01'^^xsd:date ) } UNION { ?event bio:date ?date . FILTER regex (?date,'2000') } }
